instructions: # Character Sheet## Whole Sheet:In order for the font to show up correctly in Chrome, you will have to *load unsafe scripts* using the gray sheild in the address bar of the browser.  ## Attributes & Abilities tab Names of skills and attributes are roll buttons. ## Advantages tab: Health boxes are drop down menus.  Willpower and Inspiration are roll buttons.  ## Merits and Flaws tab: The Other Traits section can be selected the Uncommon dice pool section.## Combat Tab: Combat tab uses the Dexterity as the attribute in the roll.
